resources.string: Aushini is the app that will help you to meet with your speaker, Join learning from your mobile devices, remind you with the lecture, and so on. Click THIS to skip intro and open registration page, or click NEXT to know more about the features.
You can find title, location, speaker or even learning status. This is amazing !
Share now is easy just with click a single button. And choose the destination you want.
Dont be worry coming late to watch the learning. Easily you can decide the time and we will remind you.
Find the learning location now can found in our features. You can also open it in your favorite navigation app
You can download our content and watch or listen it right in your mobile devices.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
